ResearchSubjectTerminationReasonCS CodeSystem

The reason for a research subject leaving a research study.

name: ResearchSubjectTerminationReasonCS
title: Research Subject Termination Reason CS
description: The reason for a research subject leaving a research study.

concept.display: Subject could not follow protocol, e.g. required appointments, dosing schedule, etc.
concept.definition: Subject could not follow protocol, e.g. required appointments, dosing schedule, etc.
